Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT sum(PRM_TARIFARIO), sum(VAL_DESCONTO)sum(VLPRMLIQ)
FROM seguros.v1histoparc
 
WHERE
  num_apolice = :NUM_APOLICE  and
  nrendos     = :NRENDOS      and
  nrparcel    = :NRPARCEL     and
  dacparc     = :DACPARC      and
  (operacao    = 0101 or
   operacao    = 0801)
/
 END SQL
